title: Exploring Firepower Management Center (FMC) REST APIs
slug: This Learning Lab provides an introduction to FMC REST APIs and the FMC REST API Explorer tool that is packaged with FMC. The FMC REST APIs automate the management of Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) and Legacy Firepower devices.
